<title level="1" right="Action">[Dutiful Retaliation](/Actions.aspx?ID=766) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 63 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger** An enemy within 15 feet of you hits you with a Strike and deals damage to you.

**Requirements** Your eidolon is within 15 feet of you.

</column>

---

Your eidolon instinctively flashes with ectoplasmic energy, allowing them to strike back against an enemy who dares to harm you. Your eidolon makes a melee unarmed Strike against the triggering enemy, even if that enemy isn't within your eidolon's reach.
name: Dutiful Retaliation
requirement: Your eidolon is within 15 feet of you.
requirement_markdown: Your eidolon is within 15 feet of you.
